      answer(idx) = win

      available(idx) = .false.

program main

implicit none

integer :: n, q, i, j, current_l, win_pos

integer, dimension(:,:), allocatable :: queries

integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: answer

logical, dimension(:), allocatable :: available

character(len=10000) :: first_output

integer :: a1, a2, second_output, third_output

character(len=10) :: temp_str

! Read input

read(*,*) n, q

allocate(queries(q,3))

do i =1, q

   read(*,*) queries(i,1), queries(i,2), queries(i,3)

end do

! Process first program's logic

allocate(answer(n), available(n))

available = .true.

answer = 0

do i =1, q

   integer :: l, r, win

   l = queries(i,1) ! 1-based

   r = queries(i,2)

   win = queries(i,3)

   win_pos = win

   ! collect available indices between l and r

   integer :: count =0

   integer, dimension(n) :: temp_indices

   do j = l, r

      if (available(j)) then

         count = count +1

         temp_indices(count) = j

      end if

   end do

   ! process them

   do j =1, count

      integer :: idx = temp_indices(j)

      answer(idx) = win

      available(idx) = .false.

   end do

   ! set win_pos to 0 and available

   answer(win_pos) =0

   available(win_pos) = .true.

end do

! Build first_output string

first_output = ''

do i =1, n

   write(temp_str, '(I0)') answer(i)

   first_output = trim(first_output) // trim(temp_str)

end do

! Process second program's logic

a1 =0

a2 =0

character(len=len_trim(first_output)) :: a_str = first_output

do i =2, len_trim(a_str)

   if (a_str(i:i) == a_str(i-1:i-1)) then

      if (a_str(i:i) == '1') then

         a_str(i:i) = '0'

      else

         a_str(i:i) = '1'

      end if

      a1 = a1 +1

   end if

end do

! a2 processing

character(len=len_trim(first_output)) :: b_str = first_output

do i = len_trim(b_str), 2, -1

   if (b_str(i:i) == b_str(i-1:i-1)) then

      if (b_str(i-1:i-1) == '1') then

         b_str(i-1:i-1) = '0'

      else

         b_str(i-1:i-1) = '1'

      end if

      a2 = a2 +1

   end if

end do

second_output = min(a1, a2)

! third program's calculation

third_output = (second_output /3)*2 + merge(1,0, mod(second_output,3)/=0)

! output

write(*,*) third_output

deallocate(answer, available, queries)

end program main
